about_the_game:
Thanks Merlin is an adventure horror game where the main goal is to survive.
You find yourself in a closed toy store under the control of a giant toy - Chummy Tummy. With a flashlight and a laser gun, you must find a way out of the maze of horror by solving puzzles created by the inventor Merlin.

Merlin's World - a world of childhood and fun!

An incredible adventure awaits you in the toy store. It used to be a place of cheerful atmosphere. But after a terrible incident, the shopping complex was closed. Discover the mystery of the mysterious Merlin and escape from the clutches of the cute but dreadful Chummy Tummy.

Chummy Tummy

The main hit of Merlin's store was his famous toy, Chummy Tummy. This cute creature won the hearts of all the kids and their parents.

Toys and More

You will experience the amazing use of Merlin's famous laser gun and lizard flashlight. These indispensable companions will help you overcome obstacles that you encounter along the way.

Laser Gun

Use the laser gun to open doors and locks by shooting at the laser detectors installed throughout the store.

Lizard Flashlight

The lizard flashlight will help you reveal children's drawings on the walls. Discover the fate of the children by revealing the drawings and putting the puzzles together.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a scene of violence and blood.

Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580 or better
